description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Forty Days in the Desert on the track of the Israelites; or, a Journey from Cairo by Wady Feiran to Mount Sinai and Petra. By the author of “Walks about Jerusalem” [i.e. William Henry Bartlett.] Third edition. [With illustrations and plates.]" Contributor: BARTLETT, William Henry.
